thread.section_title: Crosby Street Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful venue, great food, wonderful bar
thread.title_full: Beautiful venue, great food, wonderful bar - Review of Crosby Street Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DinerWithoutBorders
title: Beautiful venue, great food, wonderful bar
text: Met with friends and had dinner here Friday night. The food was fabulous. Cocktails were excellent! Fantastic service. Beautiful people dressed very stylishly. Place to see and be seen. Can't wait for warmer weather to sit outside. Will definitely stay at the hotel to experience it fully in the future.
